translations: 胡瓜鱼（smelt 的复数）；胡瓜鱼科
熔炼；精炼（smelt 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Outside China, at any rate, a producer smelts or sinks according to its position on aluminium’s cost curve.
sentences.translation: 无论如何，中国境外的生产者需要根据铝成本曲线的位置点来选择熔炼或者放弃。

sentences.sentence: Outside China, at any rate, a producer smelts or sinks according to its position on aluminium's cost curve.
